text: Dadasara is a village in the Tral sub-district of Jammu and Kashmir. The name of Dadasara is derived from the two words "Dadah", meaning deep, and "Sar" meaning lake. Dadasara is believed to have been once a deep lake. It is second largest village of Tral by area and population. Category:Villages in Pulwama district
title: Dadasara
